Class
Description
AIConnector
Handles the connection between the rich text area and AI-based features such as prompt generation, selection tracking, and intelligent content insertion.
AIHelperUtility
A utility class that assists with inserting rich content (text, images, hyperlinks) into a CustomStyledArea.

ColorAdapter
 
CustomStyledArea<P,R,T>
A custom rich text area based on GenericStyledArea that supports rich segments, styled paragraphs, list formatting, and AI integration.

FlowPadController
Controller class for the FlowPad landing screen.
FolderTreeBuilder
 
HeadingOption
Represents an option in a heading level selector, typically used in a ComboBox.
HyperlinkSegment
A RichSegment implementation representing a hyperlink.
HyperlinkSegmentCodec
A codec for serializing and deserializing HyperlinkSegment instances.
ImageSegment
A RichSegment implementation that represents an embedded image.

LoginController
Controller class responsible for handling the login screen functionality.
MainEditorController
The main controller class for the FlowPad text editor application.
ParStyle
Represents paragraph-level styling attributes for a rich text editor.
ParStyle.ListType
Enum for specifying list formatting type.
ParStyleCodec
A Codec implementation for serializing and deserializing ParStyle objects.
RegisterPageController
Controller class for the registration page in the FlowPad application.
RichSegment
Represents a rich content segment that can be rendered within a custom styled text area.
RichSegmentCodec
A Codec implementation for serializing and deserializing RichSegment objects.
RichTextOps<R,T>
A TextOps implementation that supports multiple segment types including TextSegment, HyperlinkSegment, and ImageSegment, enabling rich content manipulation in a GenericStyledArea.

Controller class for the Settings view in the FlowPad application.

TextAttribute
An enum stating different types of style that can be applied to TextStyle
TextSegment
A RichSegment implementation that represents a plain text segment.
TextSegmentCodec
A codec for serializing and deserializing TextSegment objects.
TextStyle
A custom style class for TextSegment.
TextStyleCodec
A codec for serializing and deserializing TextStyle objects.
